ProfileInformation.Author: shermheadryder
ProfileInformation.Description:
FlyByWire A320neo (A32NX)) for MSFS2020
(works withdevelopmentl version from 16/5/2021)

Feedback on SPAD discord welcome (same username).

Update 16.5.2021

  • Changed Seatbelt event as per #4040

  • Extended Stream Deck config - this is work in progress
    (not sure if this is also published - PM if not)

Update 9.5.2021:

  • Changed battery event name - FBW team changed the LVAR

  • Added Stream Deck config - this is work in progress

Switch Panel

Working / Extra:

  • MASTER BAT: turns on BAT 1 + 2

  • MAGNETO SWITCH:R =EXT PWR ON, OFF = EXT PWR OFF

  • MASTER ALT: turns on both engine generators

  • AVIONICS: turns on avionics (necessary for Multipanel) and also switches on all 3 ADIRS
    (ADIRS are not switched off again - this is intentional)
    turns on CREW OXYGEN

  • FUEL PUMP: switches all 6 pumps

  • DE-ICE: swtiches WING and ENG 1+2 ANTI_ICE

  • PITOT HEAT: switches PROBE/WINDOW HEAT manually ON (not necessary as A320n does this automatically)

  • COWL SWITCHs: dome light ON/OFF

  • PANEL: turns on/off OVHD panel inegrated lights (need to turn to full in plane first)and increases and decreases DIM of all displays and flood lights

  • NAV: Nav lights, Logo Lights, Wing Lights

  • STROBE: Strobe lights(Auto)

  • TAXI: switches RWY TURN OFF and NOSE to TAXI

  • LANDING: switches both LAND ON and also NODE to TO - somewhat interacting with TAXI lights

  • GEAR: works fine

Multipanel

Working / Extra:

Displayand knob:

  • ALT: works (steps of 100ft)

  • VS: displays and changes actual VS, changes FMA announiator

  • IAS: displays and changes speed bug and actual speed

  • HDG: displays and changes hdg bug and actual hdg
    (when in SELECTED HDG shows actual hdg)

  • CRS: displays and changes crs1 (ND VOR mode) and actual crs1, does NOT change FMGC RADNAV page CRS

AP Buttons:

  • AP-Light: ON when AP1or AP2ON, OFF otherwise

  • AP-Button: AP1 ON/OFF

  • HDG-Lights: ON when A32NX_FMA_LATERAL_MODE=(10 or 11), OFF otherwise

  • HDG-Button: Selected Heading (A32NX.FCU_HDG_PULL)

  • NAV:-Light: ON when A32NX_FMA_LATERAL_MODE=20, OFF otherwise

  • NAV-Button: Managed Heading (A32NX.FCU_HDG_PUSH)

  • IAS:-Light:ON when in SELECTED SPEEDMODE, OFF when in managed SPEED

  • IAS-Button: SHORT: Selected Speed (A32NX.FCU_SPD_PULL)LONG: Managed Speed (A32NX.FCU_SPD_PUSH)

  • ALT-Light: ON when A32NX_FMA_VERTICAL_MODE=10, OFF otherwise

  • ALT-Button: SHORT: Selected ALT (A32NX.FCU_ALT_PULL)LONG: ManagedALT (A32NX.FCU_ALT_PUSH)

  • VS-Light: ON when A32NX_FMA_VERTICAL_MODE=(14 or 15), OFF otherwise

  • VS-Button:SHORT: Selected VS (A32NX.FCU_VS_PULL)LONG: Level Off / 0 VS (A32NX.FCU_VS_PUSH)

  • APR-Light:ON when APPR mode is ON, OFF otherwise

  • APR-Button: APPR ON/(OFF

  • REV-Light: ON when LOC mode is ON, OFF otherwise

  • REV-Button: LOC ON/OFF

  • AUTO THOTTLESwitch: Seat Belts ON/OFF, NO SMOKING ON (not OFF), EMERGENCY LT ON (not OFF)

  • FLAPS: works as expected

  • PITCH TRIM: works but useless in A320 as it autotrims

TCA Throttle(remove all mappings in MSFS):

  • Throttle as Custom Axis (need calibration in A32NX FlyPad) incl. Reverser

  • Throttle Buttons: A/THR disconnect

  • Left Button: Parking Break

  • Right Button: Autopilot

  • Mode switch: as default - IGN for starting engines

  • Eng 1 +2: as default

Strem Deck config (work in progress)

  • 5 Pages:

    • Main
      (views might need custom views to be configured)

    • OVHD

    • FCU

    • PED (pedestal)

    • Test Page
